column4: Hi I am getting the error ' Could not connect to ceng-lrepo-lp1:80' while trying to install anything. can I get some help on this ?
do you use a proxy for web access
No I don't use proxy for web accesss. But the system is in our company and I guess there is an internal mirror
not sure how to check it
if you edit /etc/apt/apt.conf   is the proxy listed there. Also if you you run:  echo $http_proxy; echo $ftp_proxy    does it output anythig?
